Award.AwardTitle: Studying the Role and Influence of Standards on K-12 Mathematics Education: A SIRG Research Catalyst

Directorate.LongName: Direct For Education and Human Resources

Award.AbstractNarration: NCTM's standards impact research group proposes a research catalyst conference designed to make progress on understanding the improvement of mathematics teaching and learning. They will attend to this by hosting a conference around key questions related to the impact, implementation and influence of standards in schools (and the related instruction, instructional materials, assessment, teacher education, and policy issues that follow). The second intent of the conference is to build and strengthen the possibility for interdisciplinary research in mathematics education. Consequently, invitees to the conference will represent many and varied disciplines (including but not limited to: mathematics, mathematics education, sociology, measurement, and policy).

Institution.Name: National Council of Teachers of Mathematics
